name: part_008
file: tmp_【#SSholoX】世界征服に向けて…【3Dアジトお披露目】 [aGp1Q3aH_Bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The holox members are outdoors, celebrating and then saying goodbye to Laplus.
Transition scene with the holoX logo.
The members appear in their secret hideout, exhausted. A mysterious voice starts speaking to them through a monitor.
The mystery voice introduces the final challenge: long rope jumping.
The members start the long rope jumping challenge.

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Hooray!

subtitles.original: 吾輩だけクリア！
subtitles.english: I'm the only one who cleared it!

subtitles.original: 吾輩だけクリア！
subtitles.english: I'm the only one who cleared it!

subtitles.original: 吾輩だけクリア！
subtitles.english: I'm the only one who cleared it!

subtitles.original: えー、じゃあ、なんか、そうだね、ラプラス置いて、アジトに戻ろうか。
subtitles.english: Well then, how about we leave Laplus behind and head back to the hideout?

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね。
subtitles.english: Ah, that sounds like a good idea.

subtitles.original: なんで！？待って！
subtitles.english: Wait, why?!

subtitles.original: じゃあね！じゃあね！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: See ya! See ya! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 待ってー！行かないで！
subtitles.english: Wait! Don't go!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！お疲れ！お疲れ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Good work! Good work!

subtitles.original: やだー！行かないでー！
subtitles.english: Nooo! Don't go!

subtitles.original: あー、ただいまー。疲れたー。
subtitles.english: Ah, we're back. So tired.

subtitles.original: もう夢落ちだったってこと？
subtitles.english: So it was all just a dream?

subtitles.original: 皆、先に帰っちゃうから、走ってきたんだぞ、吾輩！
subtitles.english: You all left without me, so I had to run back!

subtitles.original: えらい、えらい、えらい。頑張った、頑張った。おめでとう。頑張った。
subtitles.english: Good girl, good girl. You did your best. Congrats, you worked hard.

subtitles.original: で、どうだった？この企画。洞察力と潜入捜査。
subtitles.english: So, how was this project? Insight and undercover investigation.

subtitles.original: 何が潜入なんだよ！誰も潜入してないでござる！
subtitles.english: What do you mean undercover?! Nobody was undercover!

subtitles.original: 潜入捜査、かなりきつかったよね。
subtitles.english: The undercover investigation was pretty tough, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: そうだね、きつかったよ。なんか、いじめられてないですか？これ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was. Wait, aren't we just being bullied here?

subtitles.original: 確かに、おかしいでござる。何が潜入捜査だ！
subtitles.english: True, it is weird. undercover investigation, my foot!

subtitles.original: もう、毎回これやるなよ、もう。何？これ、うるさいだけだ！
subtitles.english: Geez, don't do this every time. What is this? It's just noisy!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、いかがでしたか？
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: さて次が最後になります。
subtitles.english: Now, it's time for the final part.

subtitles.original: 秘密結社に一番必要な能力、わかりますよね？
subtitles.english: You know the most essential skill for a secret society, right?

subtitles.original: 金！力！権力！
subtitles.english: Money! Power! Authority!

subtitles.original: 力こそパワー！
subtitles.english: Might is power!

subtitles.original: 何？筋肉？分かった。
subtitles.english: What? Muscles? I get it.

subtitles.original: 筋肉じゃないだろ。多分、あの、5人で力を合わせて頑張るっていうことで、団結力。
subtitles.english: It's not muscles. It's probably about the five of us working together, unity.

subtitles.original: 団結力
subtitles.english: Unity

subtitles.original: おー！言っちゃったよ、言っちゃった。
subtitles.english: Oh! You said it, you said it.

subtitles.original: そうだね。てか、さっき団結力ないこと分かったし。もう、やってったって大丈夫でござる。メモにデカデカと書いちゃった。
subtitles.english: Right. I mean, we already saw we have no unity. We'll be fine. I already wrote it down in huge letters in my notes.

subtitles.original: 団結力か。でも、長いこと一緒にいるから普通にあるんじゃね？
subtitles.english: Unity, huh? But we've been together for a long time, so we should have some, right?

subtitles.original: 余裕じゃない？
subtitles.english: Should be a breeze, right?

subtitles.original: てか、何やらされるの？
subtitles.english: Wait, what are they going to make us do?

subtitles.original: というわけで最後にチャレンジしてもらうのは...
subtitles.english: And so, the final challenge for you is...

subtitles.original: なんと...
subtitles.english: It's...

subtitles.original: 溜めるなよ！溜めるな！
subtitles.english: Don't build up the suspense! Don't build it up!

subtitles.original: 大縄跳びです。
subtitles.english: Long rope jumping.

subtitles.original: 大縄！？何？運動会？おふざけんな、体育館じゃねえんだよ、ここは！
subtitles.english: Long rope?! What? Is this a sports day? Stop messing around, this isn't a gym!

subtitles.original: あの、帰ります。失礼します。苦手でしょう、これ、無理だよ。
subtitles.english: Um, I'm going home. Excuse me. We're bad at this, it's impossible.

subtitles.original: やだ！もうやだ、本当。帰るなら誘えよ！
subtitles.english: No! I'm done, seriously. If you're going home, take me with you!

subtitles.original: ではチャレンジお願いします。やだやだやだ！
subtitles.english: Now, please start the challenge. No, no, no!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、10回飛んでください。厳しいですか？
subtitles.english: Well then, please jump 10 times. Is that too hard?

subtitles.original: でも、あの、いろはに一人で10回飛ばせれば...。団結力のほうに行っちゃうんだよ、団結力のほう。
subtitles.english: But, if we just let Iroha jump 10 times by herself... wait, that's not unity at all.

subtitles.original: でも、これは団結力でござるから、皆で飛ばないといかんでござる。
subtitles.english: But since this is about unity, we all have to jump together.

subtitles.original: えー、めんどくさーい。
subtitles.english: Ugh, what a pain.

subtitles.original: あ、なんかここに縄が！
subtitles.english: Ah, look, there's a rope here!

subtitles.original: 縄、縄の罠が。ホロゾーからの縄の罠が。
subtitles.english: A rope, a rope trap. A rope trap from Holo-zo.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫かな。えー、吾輩回すのめんどくさい。
subtitles.english: I wonder if we'll be okay. Ugh, I don't want to be the one swinging it.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあ、ここはお姉さん組で。そうだね。
subtitles.english: Ah, then how about the older sister group takes that role? Good idea.

subtitles.original: 坂又飛ぶでござるよ。えー、飛ばなきゃいけないの？
subtitles.english: Sakamata, you're jumping. Ugh, I have to jump?

subtitles.original: え、坂又苦手なの？え、いや、得意でござる。
subtitles.english: Wait, Sakamata, are you bad at this? Oh, no, I'm great at it.

subtitles.original: 嘘つき。お姉さん、生きるの辞めろよ、もう。大丈夫だって。
subtitles.english: Liar. Sis, just give up on life already. It'll be fine.

subtitles.original: すぐ生きる辞めるやん。え、ちょっと、最後でいい？怖いから。いいよ。
subtitles.english: You're always giving up on life. Can I go last? I'm scared. Sure.

subtitles.original: あ、怖くない、怖くないけど最後。風間から入って、ラプ、殿、の順？
subtitles.english: I'm not scared, I'm not, but I'll go last. So, Kazama enters first, then Lap, then Master?

subtitles.original: いいよ。そう、一番最初が一番きついと思うから。この辺は任せるでござる、風間に。
subtitles.english: Alright. Yeah, I think going first is the toughest part. I'll leave this to Kazama.

subtitles.original: マジで怖くなってきた。いろはに任せようかな。全部いろはでいいじゃん、もう。
subtitles.english: I'm getting really scared. Maybe I'll leave it all to Iroha. Let's just have Iroha do everything.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、いろは、ラプラス、クロヱの順ね。分かった。
subtitles.english: Then the order will be Iroha, Laplus, Chloe. Got it.

subtitles.original: あれだよ、クロヱ、頑張って入らないと。あ、そうだ。クロヱが入らないと1回にならないから。そうだね、早く入ってこいよ。
subtitles.english: Listen, Chloe, you have to work hard to jump in. Ah, that's right. It doesn't count as one jump until Chloe is in. Right, so jump in quickly.

subtitles.original: 入ってから1回だよ。嘘、そうなの？そう。え、皆で飛ぶんだもんね、これ。オッケー、坂又頑張るよ。
subtitles.english: It's one jump after you're in. What, really? Yeah. Well, we're all jumping together, after all. Okay, Sakamata will do her best.

subtitles.original: とりあえず、大縄跳びスタート！
subtitles.english: Anyway, long rope jumping, start!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、行きますよ。はい。
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go. Yes.

subtitles.original: ほい！はい！早い早い早い！
subtitles.english: Hup! Yes! Quick, quick, quick!

subtitles.original: 早く来い！あ、クロヱ、クロヱ、縄、縄！
subtitles.english: Hurry up and come in! Ah, Chloe, Chloe, the rope, the rope!
